Hi there, we’re korakagaj Pty Ltd (ABN 1: Hi there, we’re korakagaj Pty Ltd (ABN 11 119 159 741) of Level 1, 121 King Street Melbourne, 3000, Australia (“korakagaj”) and welcome to our privacy policy which also applies to our Affiliate Companies. We will also collect personal information from job applications (such as, your CV, the application form itself, cover letter and interview notes).

In light of this, if you are an author we will verify your identity, in particular, your name, full address and date of birth by asking you to show us a Photo ID document. As part of korakagaj Verify, you will be asked to take a selfie which will then be compared against your Photo ID document using facial recognition technology. Founded: Founded in 2020 by three visionary friends, Kora Kagaj has emerged as a leading hub for  personalized apparel Design & Manufacturing. Recognizing the ubiquity of design in our surroundings, from the natural world to digital interfaces, the company aims to translate these creative concepts into personalized wearables and accessories, making them a tangible extension of individual expression.
TheCompany: The company's inception was propelled by Abhay Sharma, a mechanical engineering graduate, who previously co-founded the successful hyperlocal delivery startup 'Meal N Mart' alongside his friends The team expanded with the addition of Santosh Kumar Sharma, an accomplished IT professional boasting over ten years of industry experience. His strategic insight and vision led him to join Kora Kagaj in 2023 as the Technology Lead, fortifying the company's commitment to apparel Design.
TheUltimate: The ultimate aim is to seamlessly connect imaginative design concepts with real-world apparel,ensuring unparalleled satisfaction for both customers and the business itself.
KoraKagajJourney: Kora Kagaj's journey has been punctuated by several noteworthy milestones. It was virtually  incubated under the aegis of Nasscom10000 Startups, and also nurtured through the KIET TBI  Incubator via the NIDHI PRAYAS & Start in UP initiative. Additionally, the company holds  recognition as a startup under the prestigious Start in Up GoUP & Start Up India programs.  Significantly, Kora Kagaj was among the selected participants for the 'Fuel UP competition', a  collaborative endeavor by Start UP IT Policy, GoUP, Plutus Business Advisory, UPCL, and Startup  India. Further highlighting its credibility, the company secured a spot among the top 10 innovative  startups at the Start Up Expo, endorsed by Start in UP, GoUP, Elets Technomedia, and Microsoft India.
Central: Central to Kora Kagaj's mission is an unwavering commitment to personalized apparel designs,  meticulously crafted to embody individual ideas. Serving both individuals and businesses, the  company collaborates with a team of industry-leading designers, who employ cutting-edge tools and  technology to transform ideas into distinctive designs.
KoraKagajalso: Kora Kagaj also places paramount importance on personalized attention. Ensuring each client is  treated with dedicated care, the company caters to a diverse spectrum of design requirements.  Additionally, Kora Kagaj offers comprehensive design assistance, guiding clients through the process  of translating their ideas into exceptional artwork. Backed by premium tools and expertise, the team  presents clients with an array of design options, ensuring the creation of a piece that resonates profoundly with their vision.
KoraKagajstands: Kora Kagaj stands as a testament to innovation, collaboration, and an unwavering commitment to  transforming creative concepts into tangible, customized apparel that captures the essence of  individual expression.
